attributes.action: tell people that the terrorists are acting for their own agenda and not in the name of islam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a young british muslim and I understood from my early childhood that islam is a faith of peace and compation ,I was told that it is wrong to harm even an animal or an insect and our profit recognised all faiths and lived peacefully among all nations and beliefs but this colourful picture is tainted by the actions of extremists , I call upon all peaceful law obediant muslim citizens to join my petition to show that we are free from these people who are killing and spoiling the healthy relations we enjoy with other religions ,and to tell the wourld that those criminals and terrorists are not working under our names.
